website_summaries.verdict: A superb trainer that helps you focus on golf swing fundamentals to develop a picture-perfect swing.
pros: Designed to help golfers young and old improve the 8 elements of a golf swing
Includes instructions written by PGA teaching professional
Available in left- and right-handed varieties
cons: Grip tends to run small and wears down quickly

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Just ok for muscle memory. It would be nice to have some type of sound device such that included with the IMPACT SNAP Golf Swing device be incorporated into it so that you can also hear when the proper swing move is being made. For now it's just an over priced club
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Grip is Way Too Small-Even For The Smallest of Hands
customer_reviews.text: I wear a men's medium large golf glove and the grip is way too small. My son wears a medium men's golf glove and the training grip on this club is way too small for him too. I got the men's version in yellow. This club is basically useless because I cannot place my hands on the junior size preformed grip.
customer_reviews.author: Otis

customer_reviews.title: At a golf lesson to fix where my swing was ...
customer_reviews.text: At a golf lesson to fix where my swing was going wrong the instructor had me use this to help get my body motion to finish with my arms. It worked. I use this a little bit often to ingrain the memory and make the fuller turn a habit.
customer_reviews.author: richard bell

customer_reviews.title: It did vastly improve my swing.
customer_reviews.text: This product has vastly improved my swing and golf game in a week. Not only will it help with hand placement, the weight makes it help find proper backswing and follow through. If it taught where to place the ball in the stance, and club placement it would cover everything. I wrote the review as I’m trying to find a woman’s size for my wife. I carry it in my bag, I swing it a few times when I feel my swing getting out of whack.
customer_reviews.author: Scottythegreat

customer_reviews.title: Best trainer on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I have used one of these for years, and my Dad used one before me. My daughters used the women's model. One of the best swing trainers there is or it would not have been around for more than 40 years. A lot of them come and go or are prohibitively expensive. I still use it as a trainer in the off-season to keep muscles in tune and the swing tuned.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smithee

customer_reviews.title: Over rated warm up tool.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good gadget to have for basic swing repetition and mostly for warming up. Its undeserving of a 5 star rating in regards to swing training. If it’s marketed as a warm up tool, then I’d gave it all five stars.
customer_reviews.author: TheAmazonPrime

customer_reviews.title: Improve Golf Release
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful tool for helping you FEEL what a proper release is!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The head of the club flew off after only 2 months of use
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great training aid.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. It is also great to take out on the course to adjust your tempo and balance.
customer_reviews.author: ArmyMathDoc

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I had some lessons with pga golf pro who had this. Liked it so much, bought my own. Can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: turbo

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Golf Tool
customer_reviews.text: Puts your grip in correct position and helps to swing on plane. Also a good warm up tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still a great swing tool
customer_reviews.text: I use midsize grips so this is a little problematic given standard grip size. Still a great swing tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I got this swing trainer per the recommendation of my golf pro, it works well and is getting the slice out of my swing. Also great for warming up.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie S.

customer_reviews.title: golf swing help tool
customer_reviews.text: this product has made "my" swing feel, again to me, much smoother. With the weight of the club, it was like, I had to slow everything down. It definitely gives me a feel for the correct swing plane and speed.
customer_reviews.author: jay riley

customer_reviews.title: Swing truer with Matzie
customer_reviews.text: The Matzie swing trainer has really helped my swing - better balance - I use it on the range before hitting - and sometimes during practice when my shots are starting to hook or slice. I am a 5'4" woman - and bought the woman's Matzie first - but it is too light to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised as long as you use it regularly. If you swing this club 100 times a day for several weeks and take it to the driving range for use between shots you will improve your distance, direction and consistency.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Club does its job! Puts your hands in correct ...
customer_reviews.text: Club does its job! Puts your hands in correct position and finish. Has made a big difference in my swing and strokes off my game!
customer_reviews.author: mkt

customer_reviews.title: Great price too
customer_reviews.text: This is the right product adn delivery is always very fast. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: wating for the weather to improve so i can go outside for full swing
customer_reviews.author: Roger Rucker

customer_reviews.title: I take the swings recommended for practice and take it on the course if ...
customer_reviews.text: I take the swings recommended for practice and take it on the course if I start having trouble. It is a good reminder for proper grip and builds muscle memory of a good swing.
customer_reviews.author: Judging Bull

customer_reviews.title: One of the best swing trainers on the market
customer_reviews.text: One of the best swing trainers on the market, I keep it in my bag and warm up with it all the time and people always ask me about it when they use it as well...Great product.
customer_reviews.author: steve sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one
customer_reviews.text: While all the others claim to help, this one REALLY does. It is made to help transfer weight and get your hands where they need to be. Your overall confidence will improve.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great Warm Up and Training Club.
customer_reviews.text: Great Warm Up and Training Club. Bought 2, one each for my Wife and I.
customer_reviews.author: High Plains Drifter

customer_reviews.title: Great practice tool.
customer_reviews.text: My Pro told me this club would become my best friend. I couldn't agree more, it forces you to grip the club properly and follow through the swing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Boucher

customer_reviews.title: My husband says aaaaaah!!! he loaned his ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband says aaaaaah!!! he loaned his old one to our son and he missed it greatly. Purchased the same exact one he gave away and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharie Niblock

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: If it had a men's grip would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tom G.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have For All Golfers
customer_reviews.text: This has helped my golf swing so much. Let's you feel the way a proper golf swing is supposed to feel. Really helps the muscle memory
customer_reviews.author: Theresa N

customer_reviews.title: Great training aid!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome training aid, i have recommended product to other golfers.
customer_reviews.author: richard a. rasay

customer_reviews.title: Matzie Swing Assist
customer_reviews.text: Good warm up and training aid. The shape helps a golfer get the club in the right position in the backswing and it's slightly heavy to help you loosen up.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Nice training Aid
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a great train aid. I have had one for years then my grandson got it.
customer_reviews.author: Butch Cillessen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works okay, but the grip is starting to wear out after only a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sadisticmgt

customer_reviews.title: which I like. It is the best swing trainer I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This version is a bit heavier, which I like. It is the best swing trainer I have come across.
customer_reviews.author: M Ray

customer_reviews.title: Mattie Men's swing trainer
customer_reviews.text: Husband says "It's the only one that has ever worked for me!"
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tempo and warming up before rangr or round.
customer_reviews.text: Its only been a few weeks since receiving item. It is exactly what I thought it would be...a molded grip and weighted swing trainer. So far, I've noticed it helps with tempo, hand muscle memory & great warm up tool.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Downs

customer_reviews.title: Helps improve your swing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as i'm a novice golfer and wanted to help my mechanics as i'm still getting used to swinging a club. This has given me improvement on my swing, most noticeably on my follow through. Amazon sells a lot of swing aids on here, so I asked some of my more experienced golfing friends about this club and they said a lot of people use it and they have seen them in many bags. Only thing i'm knocking a star off for is the fact its now 10 bucks cheaper than when I bought it, but I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M

customer_reviews.title: Only swing trainer I would use
customer_reviews.text: This a replacement for an older version that was lost. It is the only golf swing trainer I would use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Owen Berry

customer_reviews.title: great warmup tool!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I already have one of these. This is for my second Florida set. Would recommend to anyone. Great warmup tool
customer_reviews.author: rlevitas

customer_reviews.title: Swing Trainer
customer_reviews.text: The grip requires the hands to be in the proper position and alignment to effectivley swing the club. The weighted shaft and head assists in loosening up the hips and back muscles for a more relaxed set-up and swing.
customer_reviews.author: Dale E. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Came in the expected time and working even better than expected on improving my swing. Definitely worth the money if you want to improve your game..
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: training device
customer_reviews.text: Has been a help in fixing my swing so that it repeats (usually). The trainer seems expensive but I think it is worth the money
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Been using the Matzie for about a month. At this time I haven't seen any improvement although it has help in placing my right hand in the correct position. Hopefully in the future Improvement is seen.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Useful for warm-up and strength training. Somewhat helpful for learning the proper grip if you have never learned it.
customer_reviews.author: Heavy Weight

customer_reviews.title: This golf swing tool is working for me. It ...
customer_reviews.text: This golf swing tool is working for me. It has given me the necessary swing motion to ensure I make solid contact off the tee. It gets my endorsement.
customer_reviews.author: webABCs

customer_reviews.title: Practice, Practice, Practice
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I did not give it a 5 right now is because I have not used it enough yet to see how it affects my swing, if it helps correct minor errors with my swing.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Found a similar product in a sports store for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: don't bother
customer_reviews.text: A waste of time and money. Grip does not fit a man's hand. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: al

product_meta.title: Matzie Men's Assist Swing Trainer
product_meta.description: Al Geiberger, Mr. 59 says: "For ten years, I've used the ASSIST to improve my game. The ASSIST will terminate your slice and automatically improve your swing." Join thousands who use the ASSIST, and experience the thrill of better golf with longer, more accurate shots, and lower scores. The patented ASSIST, with its precision bent shaft, exaggerates the release with a force 16 times greater than a 6 iron to teach the correct hand action for longer straighter shots. Plus it eliminates slicing. The ASSIST is the world's best selling swing trainer with hundreds of thousands in use by PGA, Senior PGA, and LPGA touring pros, as well as golf schools, universities, and amateurs of all skill levels. Whether you're at home, in the office, or at the range, swinging the Amazing ASSIST a few minutes each day makes golf easy and enjoyable. The ASSIST comes with instructions written by a PGA Teaching Professional.
feature_bullets: Matzie Assist Swing Trainer, the only swing trainer in the world that improves the 8 major elements of the golf swing
Amazing assist teaches proper grip, strength, weight transfer, clubhead speed, extenstion, wrist release, muscle memory, tempo & timing
